testsuite.name: com.automatethethings.truststrap.TrustStrapClientTest

testcase.name: fetchWithMethod NOISE throws when server address blank()
fetchWithMethod SPKI throws when pin blank()
fetchWithMethod DANE throws when server URL blank()
fetchCABundle tries all enabled methods and throws BootstrapFailedException()
fetchWithMethod SPKI throws when server URL blank()
fetchWithMethod NOISE throws when server static key blank()
fetchWithMethod DIRECT throws when server URL blank()
fetchWithMethod NOISE throws on invalid address format()
fetchWithMethod NOISE throws on unreachable host()
fetchCABundle throws NoMethodsConfiguredException when no methods enabled()
constructor accepts config and does not throw()
fetchWithMethod SPKI throws when pin wrong length()
fetchWithMethod NOISE throws when server static key wrong length()
